questions.prompt: Level 1: Load the Van! Find all 2 subsets of {Car}.
Level 2: Find all 4 subsets of {Ball, Bear}.
questions.hint: Don't forget the Empty Set and the Full Set!

questions.prompt: Level 3: Master Mover! Find all 8 subsets.
questions.hint:
List:
- Empty
- Singles (3)
- Doubles (3)
- Full Set (1)
